name: xcpengine-fw
label: XCPENGINE: pipeline for processing of  structural and functional data.
description: The XCP imaging pipeline (XCP system) for  preprocessing of structural and functional data.

designfile.description: designfile: list all modules to run

sge-cpu.description: [SGE] How many cores to request. This is used for the underlying '-pe threaded' option.

sge-ram.description: [SGE] How much RAM to request. This is used for the underlying '-l h_vmem' option.

sge-short.description: [SGE] Tell the cluster this is a short job. This caps the job to 90 minutes wall-clock and 15 minutes of CPU.

task_name.description: name of the task to perform either task regression or task

author: Ted Satterthwaite
cite: Ciric, Rastko and Rosen, Adon F. G. and Erus, Guray and Cieslak, Matthew and Adebimpe, Azeez and Cook, Philip A. and Bassett, Danielle S. and Davatzikos, Christos and Wolf, Daniel H. and Satterthwaite, Theodore D., Mitigating head motion artifact in functional connectivity MRI
